languages.text: "А если уж и наших сил не хватит, то господин Хротко с блюстителями явно найдет, чем встретить врага. Вон сколько смертоносных игрушек они на себе таскают". {n}Монтэг иронично улыбается.{/n}

"And even if our forces prove insufficient, Captain Hrotko and his squad will surely find something with which to meet the enemy. That's a lot of deadly toys they're packing." {n}He smiles sardonically.{/n}
languages.original_text: "А если уж и наших сил не хватит, то господин Хротко с блюстителями явно найдет, чем встретить врага. Вон сколько смертоносных игрушек они на себе таскают". {n}Монтэг иронично улыбается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "And even if our forces are not enough, Officer Hrotko and his enforcers will surely find something to meet the enemy with. They're carrying a lot of deadly toys on their backs." {n}Monteg smiles ironically.{/n}

"And even if our forces are not enough, Officer Hrotko and his enforcers will surely find something to meet the enemy with. They're carrying a lot of deadly toys on their backs." {n}Monteg smiles ironically.{/n}

"And even if our forces prove insufficient, Officer Hrotko and his enforcers will surely find something with which to meet the enemy. They are carrying a lot of deadly toys on their backs." {n}Monteg smiles ironically.{/n}

"And even if our forces prove insufficient, Officer Hrotko and his enforcers will surely find something with which to meet the enemy. They are carrying a lot of deadly toys on their backs." {n}Monteg smiles ironically.{/n}

"And even if our forces prove insufficient, Captain Hrotko and his squad will surely find something with which to meet the enemy. That's a lot of deadly toys they're packing." {n}He smiles sardonically.{/n}

"And even if our forces prove insufficient, Captain Hrotko and his squad will surely find something with which to meet the enemy. That's a lot of deadly toys they're packing." {n}He smiles sardonically.{/n}

languages.text: «E incluso si nuestras fuerzas no bastan, el capitán Hrotko y su escuadrón encontrarán la forma de rechazar al enemigo. Llevan un montón de juguetitos letales». {n}Esboza una sonrisa sarcástica.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And even if our forces prove insufficient, Captain Hrotko and his squad will surely find something with which to meet the enemy. That's a lot of deadly toys they're packing." {n}He smiles sardonically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «E incluso si nuestras fuerzas no bastan, el capitán Hrotko y su escuadrón encontrarán la forma de rechazar al enemigo. Llevan un montón de juguetitos letales». {n}Esboza una sonrisa sarcástica.{/n}

languages.text: 「こちらの戦力が不十分であることが分かっても、フロトコ中隊長と彼の部隊は、敵を迎え撃つため何かを必ず見つけてくるでしょう。彼らは、たくさん危ないおもちゃを詰め込んでいますから」{n}男は不敵な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And even if our forces prove insufficient, Captain Hrotko and his squad will surely find something with which to meet the enemy. That's a lot of deadly toys they're packing." {n}He smiles sardonically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「こちらの戦力が不十分であることが分かっても、フロトコ中隊長と彼の部隊は、敵を迎え撃つため何かを必ず見つけてくるでしょう。彼らは、たくさん危ないおもちゃを詰め込んでいますから」{n}男は不敵な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}

languages.text: “而且就算我们的人手不足，赫洛卡上尉和他的小队也肯定能找到对付敌人的东西。他们带了很多相当致命的小玩具。”{n}他露出了讥讽的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And even if our forces prove insufficient, Captain Hrotko and his squad will surely find something with which to meet the enemy. That's a lot of deadly toys they're packing." {n}He smiles sardonically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “而且就算我们的人手不足，赫洛卡上尉和他的小队也肯定能找到对付敌人的东西。他们带了很多相当致命的小玩具。”{n}他露出了讥讽的微笑。{/n}

languages.text: "Und selbst, wenn sich unsere Truppen als zu dürftig erweisen, werden Captain Hrotko und sein Trupp gewiss etwas finden, womit sie den Feind bekämpfen können. Sie haben reichlich tödliche Spielzeuge eingepackt." {n}Er grinst sardonisch.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And even if our forces prove insufficient, Captain Hrotko and his squad will surely find something with which to meet the enemy. That's a lot of deadly toys they're packing." {n}He smiles sardonically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und selbst, wenn sich unsere Truppen als zu dürftig erweisen, werden Captain Hrotko und sein Trupp gewiss etwas finden, womit sie den Feind bekämpfen können. Sie haben reichlich tödliche Spielzeuge eingepackt." {n}Er grinst sardonisch.{/n}

languages.text: « Et même si nos forces ne suffisent pas, le capitaine Hrotko et son escouade auront certainement de quoi affronter l'ennemi. Après tout, je doute que les jouets qu'ils transportent soient en plastique, » {n}plaisante-t-il avec un sourire sardonique.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And even if our forces prove insufficient, Captain Hrotko and his squad will surely find something with which to meet the enemy. That's a lot of deadly toys they're packing." {n}He smiles sardonically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Et même si nos forces ne suffisent pas, le capitaine Hrotko et son escouade auront certainement de quoi affronter l'ennemi. Après tout, je doute que les jouets qu'ils transportent soient en plastique, » {n}plaisante-t-il avec un sourire sardonique.{/n}

languages.text: "Kuvvetlerimiz yetersiz gelse dahi Komutan Hrotko, mangasıyla birlikte düşmanı karşılayabilecek bir şeyler toparlayacaktır. Neticede ellerinde epey ölümcül oyuncaklar var." {n}Tatlı sert gülümsüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And even if our forces prove insufficient, Captain Hrotko and his squad will surely find something with which to meet the enemy. That's a lot of deadly toys they're packing." {n}He smiles sardonically.{/n}
